column4: can anyone confirm that this bug is legit? https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/network-manager/+bug/481432 and if so is there any fix?
it's legit, it used to happen to me, i bought a new router, been a happy camper ever since
umm a new router is not an option, is there any work around?
you need to look at the thread in launchpad and participate, that's the workaround
